<h3 id="X38107">X(38107) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(3), X(4), X(7)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6-2*(b^2-b*c+c^2)*a^4-2*(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a^3+3*(b^2+c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^2+2*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)*a-2*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38107) = X(3)-4*X(142) = X(3)+2*X(5805) = 2*X(3)+X(31671) = X(4)+2*X(31657) = 2*X(5)+X(7) = 4*X(5)-X(5779) = 2*X(7)+X(5779) = 2*X(9)-5*X(1656) = 2*X(142)+X(5805) = 8*X(142)+X(31671) = 4*X(5805)-X(31671) = 4*X(5880)+5*X(18493) = 2*X(21151)-3*X(38065) = X(21151)+3*X(38073) = X(21151)-6*X(38080) = X(21151)+2*X(38137) = X(21168)-6*X(38171) = X(31671)+4*X(38122) = X(38065)+2*X(38073) = X(38065)-4*X(38080) = 3*X(38065)-4*X(38111) = 3*X(38065)+4*X(38137) = X(38113)-3*X(38171)</b>
<p>X(38107) lies on these lines: {2,5762}, {3,142}, {4,31657}, {5,7}, {9,1656}, {30,21151}, {57,7082}, {140,5759}, {144,3090}, {355,5542}, {381,971}, {382,5732}, {390,5901}, {511,38143}, {515,38030}, {517,38036}, {518,5790}, {527,5055}, {542,38086}, {546,36991}, {547,6172}, {942,5290}, {952,1056}, {954,6911}, {1482,2550}, {1503,38115}, {1699,5918}, {2095,3820}, {2346,32141}, {2800,38207}, {2829,38124}, {2951,22793}, {3091,36996}, {3243,12645}, {3254,12331}, {3358,37612}, {3526,5735}, {3545,38139}, {3564,38164}, {3628,18230}, {3652,13159}, {3843,31672}, {3940,6854}, {4307,15251}, {4312,8227}, {4654,10157}, {5044,5833}, {5050,38186}, {5054,21153}, {5056,20059}, {5070,6666}, {5223,9956}, {5249,19541}, {5603,35272}, {5657,8728}, {5686,38042}, {5709,11231}, {5731,20420}, {5733,17366}, {5763,17582}, {5791,10172}, {5812,16853}, {5840,38152}, {5842,38125}, {5844,38170}, {5845,14561}, {5850,10175}, {5851,23513}, {5852,38109}, {5853,10247}, {6147,6864}, {6824,8732}, {6846,24470}, {6855,34753}, {6859,12848}, {6913,18541}, {6918,21617}, {6944,8232}, {7580,27186}, {7680,33558}, {7717,21841}, {7743,10384}, {8236,10283}, {8255,18530}, {8727,9776}, {9669,14100}, {9955,11372}, {10246,28452}, {10427,10738}, {10861,17532}, {11502,17718}, {11518,37712}, {11928,17668}, {12650,37615}, {13374,15587}, {15298,31479}, {16593,24833}, {17313,29016}, {18357,30340}, {18443,28160}, {18525,25557}, {19907,20119}, {21164,24644}, {22791,35514}, {24474,38200}, {26446,38204}, {26806,36652}, {27475,29010}, {28194,38094}, {28204,38024}, {28234,38201}, {30274,37718}, {38037,38205}</p>
<p>
X(38107) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {7, 5817}, {5805, 38122}, {6173, 38150}, {11038, 38149}, {38036, 38052}, {38054, 38151}, {38111, 38137}<br>
X(38107) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (2, 38171), (3, 38122), (381, 38150), (5050, 38186), (5054, 38093), (5686, 38042), (5779, 5817), (5817, 5), (8236, 10283), (10246, 38053), (11038, 38041), (21151, 38111), (21168, 38113), (26446, 38204), (38030, 38054), (38052, 38172), (38121, 38052), (38122, 142)<br>
X(38107) = anticomplement of X(38113)<br>
X(38107) = complement of X(21168)<br>
X(38107) = X(31671)-Gibert-Moses centroid<br>
X(38107) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 21168, 38113), (3, 5805, 31671), (5, 7, 5779), (5, 5708, 5789), (142, 5805, 3), (2550, 20330, 1482), (5732, 18482, 382), (5735, 20195, 31658), (20195, 31658, 3526), (21151, 38111, 38065), (38036, 38172, 38121), (38073, 38080, 38065), (38080, 38137, 38111), (38173, 38174, 38041)<br>
</p>
